items.sentence: There\'s no doubt Tom is the one who stole Mary\'s necklace.
Tom thinks his country is the greatest country in the world.
Tom told her that he had written that poem two years before.
Tom told me that he thinks Mary is much prettier than Alice.
I carefully considered my options before making my decision.
After the rain had let up a bit, we made a dash for the car.
After you finish reading the book, put it back where it was.
Tom might\'ve known the answer, but he didn\'t say anything.
Tom is sure that Mary didn\'t really go to Boston last week.
Tom is worried because he should\'ve heard from Mary by now.
